mapper.select: SELECT contractno, lender, borrower, `type`, goods, duedate, picture, record, description, agreed FROM contract c, `user` u WHERE u.userno = #{userno} AND (c.lender = u.id OR c.borrower = u.id)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract (lender, borrower, `type`, goods, duedate, picture, record, description, agreed) VALUES (#{lender}, #{borrower}, #{type}, #{goods}, #{duedate}, #{picture}, #{record}, #{description}, #{agreed})
